title: The true honor of navigation and navigators: or, holy meditations for sea-men Written vpon our sauiour Christ his voyage by sea, Matth. 8. 23. &c. Whereunto are added certaine formes of prayers for sea trauellers, suited to the former meditations, vpon the seuerall occasions that fall at sea. By Iohn Wood, Doctor in Diuinitie.
author: Wood, John, d. 1625.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, dwelling in Pater-noster-row, neere the signe of the golden Cocke,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
